article_title: Gayarthri Ramprasad: Exercise, meditation and therapy help hold major depression at bay

article_metadata.description: Gayarthri RamprasadFor much of her life, author and mental health activist Gayarthri Ramprasad has struggled with depression. When she was a young woman growing up in a respected Brahmin family in Bangalore, India, a heavy, powerful feeling sometimes overtook her body and mind, leaving her unable to function.

og.description: On Oct. 9 at 7 p.m., Ramprasad will be at St. Paul’s Fitzgerald theater as one of the featured guests on “A Celebration of Women in Recovery.”
og.title: Gayarthri Ramprasad: Exercise, meditation and therapy help hold major depression at bay
